NEWS:

Thank you all who tried the tools tech demo and gave me some feedback!

The next techdemo is about crafting and using the items you collect using tools. You will be able to customize your farm and home with the workbench.

____________________________

Hello together!

This game is still heavily in development and i hope to get a lot of feedback from you:-) So that i can create something you will love!

Once in a while I will post "Tech Demos" that you can try. Please leave a comment or feedback! It means a lot to me.

The game is inspired by my favorites like Azure Dreams, Harvest Moon, Stardew Valley, Pokemon, Grandia and many more.
